items.summary: Create a new transparent PNG asset by cropping the uploaded image `1770306231356.png` to include only the flower-like logo, the word “Aurelie”, and the smaller text “Fine Jewellery” (remove all surrounding background), and add it to the frontend static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.

Replace the header branding image in `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx` so it uses the newly generated transparent logo lockup asset instead of `/assets/1770304385246~2.png`, keeping the existing header layout/behavior (sticky header, scroll resize, navigation button).

Replace the footer branding in `frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSystem.tsx` so the left-column brand block uses the newly generated transparent logo lockup as a single image (remove the existing separate logo image and separate “Aurelie”/“Fine Jewellery” text), while keeping the rest of the footer content unchanged.
